snippet.title: Master Blaster - Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Here's your look at Master Blaster in this teaser trailer for the upcoming 'Aim-and-Shoot' game that combines classic arcade action with air-hockey physics and strategic, tactical and precision elements. Master Blaster is coming to Steam and itch.io, and a demo is available now.

Blast away against swarms of chaotic forces, deliver precision shots or plan your shots to restore cosmic order and become Master Blaster!
